body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mildred A. Davis. Father of Joseph R. Davis, Mary E. Davis, Lucinda C. Davis, Martha H. Davis, Mildred A. Davis, Verene Davis, and Laura E. Davis. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Employed Enoch Luckey as a brick mason in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860.
